ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] [OT] Fascinating Article
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Skimming the article, a bizarre statistical quirk appears...69% of women play with a romantic partner , while only 16% of men do. So who the hell are the
ygData.messageBody:
--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
> At 09:53 AM 2/15/2002 -0500, you wrote:
> >It funny, but I was just reading a statistical analysis of the EQ player
> >base and it claimed female players enjoy EQ more than male players.
> >Something to do with women exploiting the social aspects of the game where
> >men just powerlevel and get phat lewtz. Buggered if I can find that link
> >now though, sorry. It was the same sort of stereotypical stuff as listed
> >below.
>
> That link was actually used as fodder for this article, and was cited:
>
> http://www.nickyee.com/eqt/report.html

Skimming the article, a bizarre statistical quirk appears...69% of women play
with a "romantic partner", while only 16% of men do.

So who the hell are the partners the additional 53% of women are playing
with? Shouldn't the two numbers for the two sexes be nearly identical? Are
52% of the women lesbians, 26% playing with the other 26%?

More likely this shows the invalidity of the entire survey, because the
voters are self-selecting, and a different kind of female chooses to waste
his time taking the survey than male. My wife not only wouldn't take it, but
(she's quite controlling, and our greatest source of tension is that I cannot
be controlled) she actually complained that I was wasting time when she saw
me taking it.

=====
Coffee contains water...so does your pee
